item.title: Setup a Rails Project with Postgres and Docker
item.description: I like computer and music. I like food. I love my kids. And I like to play Call of Duty. Space A screencast is a digital video recording of a computer screen while someone is using it, and usually includes audio narration. A course based on screencasts will have the instructor recording their screen while they run through presentation slides, terminal commands, setting up a development environment, writing code in an editor, running code, etc.

item.title: Hey, I'm Kiruba
item.description: I’m a developer. This is my “home base” on the internet. I’ll post some thoughts about things I’m interested in. stay tuned!!
